deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The pyLoad YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring pyLoad using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error when trying to import the YAML configuration.

Please verify that you have a stable internet connection and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the pyLoad YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.title: The pyLoad YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.description:
Configuring pyLoad using YAML is being removed but there was an authentication error when trying to import the YAML configuration.

Correct the YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the pyLoad YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: The pyLoad YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring pyLoad using YAML is being removed but there was an unknown error when trying to import the YAML configuration.

Ensure the YAML configuration is correct and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the pyLoad YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
